title: Mercy
lyrics:
[intro] (G)
(Hit the beat and, take it to the verse now)
(G)Yeah yeah yeah x4
(C7) (G)
 
I love (G)you (ooh, ooh)
But I gotta stay (G)true (ooh, ooh)
My morals got me on my (C7)knees
I'm begging please stop playing (G)games (ooh, ooh)
I don't know what this (D7)is
But you got me (C7)good
Just like you knew you (G)would (ooh, ooh)
I don't know what you (D7)do
But you do it (C7)well
I'm under your (G)spell (ooh, ooh)
 
[chorus]
You got me begging you for (G)mercy (yeah, yeah, yeah)
Why won't you re(G)lease me (yeah, yeah, yeah)
You got me begging you for (C7)mercy (yeah, yeah, yeah)
Why won't you re(G)lease me (yeah, yeah, yeah)
I said re(D7)leaaa-(C7)ase (G)me (yeah, yeah, yeah)
 
Now you think that (G)I (ooh, ooh)
Will be something on the (G)side (ooh, ooh)
But you got to under-(C7)stand that I need a man
Who can take my (G)hand, yes I do (ooh, ooh)
I don't know what this (D7)is
'Cause you got me (C7)good
Just like you knew you (G)would (ooh, ooh)
I don't know what you (D7)do
But you do it (C7)well
I'm under your (G)spell (ooh, ooh)
 
[chorus]
You got me begging you for (G)mercy (yeah, yeah, yeah)
Why won't you re(G)lease me (yeah, yeah, yeah)
You got me begging you for (C7)mercy (yeah, yeah, yeah)
Why won't you re(G)lease me (yeah, yeah, yeah)
I said re(D7)leaaa-(C7)ase (G)me (yeah, yeah, yeah)
 
[bridge]
(G)I'm begging you for mercy
Yes, why (G)won't you release me?
(G)I'm begging you for mercy
(D7)You got me begging
(D7)You got me begging
(D7)You got me begging [stop]
 
[chorus]
(G)Mercy (yeah, yeah, yeah)
Why won't you re(G)lease me (yeah, yeah, yeah)
You got me begging you for (C7)mercy (yeah, yeah, yeah)
Why won't you re(G)lease me (yeah, yeah, yeah)
You got me begging you for (D7)mee-(C7)ercy (G) yeah (yeah, yeah, yeah)
 
I'm begging you for (G)mercy (yeah, yeah, yeah)
I'm begging you for (G)mercy (yeah, yeah, yeah)
I'm begging you for (C7)mercy (yeah, yeah, yeah)
I'm begging you for (G)mercy (yeah, yeah, yeah)
Why wonâ€™t you re(D7)leaaa-(C7)ase (G)me yeah! Yeah! (yeah, yeah, yeah)
(Break it down)
 
[outro]
(G)Mercy, begging you for mercy
(G)You got me begging, down on my knees
(G)You got me begging, begging you for mercy
(D)You got me begging, you got me begging
(D)You got me begging (G) [end]
